About Us

Simple & Beautiful

Office applications that are used everyday should be pleasant and easy to use. That's why we take great pride in creating simple and beautiful applications that we know you'll love.

Democratic Software

Applications are living concepts that change and evolve as needs change and evolve. To ensure that we meet new demands, we employ a democratic process to ensure that your needs and special requirements are met.

Working with You

ProwareLabs applications are built with municipal staff. We continuously work directly with the end user to ensure our applications suit your needs.

Client Testimonials

Jason Vezina, CBO

Township of Edwardsburgh / Cardinal

[ProInspector] ... has definitely enhanced the permit process by reducing the data entry.

Dan Tessier, Building Inspector
